snippet.title: 77p Egg: Eggwife - Release Trailer - Games have peaked #Eggwife #RD2023 #trailer #steam
snippet.description:
In 2023, the retro shooter community finally gets the game they deserve!
Eggwife - games have peaked on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1317020/77p_egg_Eggwife

After a sexual mishap, our hero 77p egg finds itself on a quest to find a new wife while the world is overrun by sentient sewage and a milk-obsessed cult. A dumb and crass FPS inspired by the likes of Postal 2, Duke 3D, and Goat Simulator.

Developer: 77p Egg Studios
Publisher: Hyperstrange

Twitter/X: twitter.com/HYPERSTRANGE

Release date: September 18, 2023

Review keys available - Lurkit & Keymailer
